at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level

Class LevelInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.LevelInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LevelInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Holds general information about a level like the number, a score object and a pointer to the level image and collision image.
    Author:
    Thomas Koch
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int collisionResource
      Not to be displayed.
      int imageResource
      The image to be displayed.
      int number
      The number of the level.
      Highscores.Score score
      Received from the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • number

        public int number
        The number of the level. The first level has number 1.

      • score

        public Highscores.Score score
        Received from the database.

      • imageResource

        public int imageResource
        The image to be displayed.

      • collisionResource

        public int collisionResource
        Not to be displayed. Holds collision information. White pixels represent collidable objects, red pixels represent collectables and black pixels represent the background.
